user.title: Configure Add-on Connection
user.description: You only need to change these settings if you modified the default configuration of the Frameo Control Backend add-on. Otherwise, just click **Submit** to continue.

data_description.addon_host: IP address of the Frameo Control Backend add-on
data_description.addon_port: Port of the Frameo Control Backend add-on

connection_type.title: Select Connection Method
connection_type.description: Choose how you want to connect to your Frameo device.

menu_options.Network: Network (IP Address) - Connect over your local network using wireless ADB
menu_options.USB: USB Cable (Recommended for setup) - Connect directly via USB cable

Network.title: Configure Network Connection
Network.description: Enter the IP address of your Frameo device. Make sure Wireless ADB is enabled in the device's Developer Options.

usb_select.title: Select USB Device
usb_select.description: Select your Frameo device from the list below. After clicking Submit, an **'Allow USB Debugging'** prompt will appear on the device screen. Tap **Allow** and make sure to check the **'Always allow from this computer'** checkbox to remember this connection.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device at the specified network address.
error.cannot_connect_usb: Connection failed. This may be because the 'Allow USB Debugging' prompt on the device was not approved in time. Please try again.
error.addon_connection_failed: Could not connect to the Frameo Control Backend add-on at the specified address. Please check the host and port.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of the Frameo control integration is allowed.
abort.addon_not_running: Could not connect to the Frameo Control Backend add-on. Please ensure it is installed, running, and has started successfully.
abort.no_devices_found: No ADB devices found connected via USB. Ensure the device is plugged in, Developer Options are enabled, and USB Debugging is turned on in its settings.

init.title: Frameo Control Options
init.description: Configure the Frameo Control integration settings. Screen resolution is auto-detected, but you can override it here if needed.

data_description.addon_host: IP address of the Frameo Control Backend add-on (usually 127.0.0.1)
data_description.addon_port: Port of the Frameo Control Backend add-on (usually 5000)
data_description.screen_width: Fallback screen width if auto-detection fails
data_description.screen_height: Fallback screen height if auto-detection fails

run_adb_command.name: Run ADB Command
run_adb_command.description: Execute a custom ADB shell command on the Frameo device. The result will be returned and also fired as an event.

command.name: Command
command.description: The ADB shell command to execute (e.g., 'input keyevent 26' to toggle power).
